CHAT.comment: ASHBEL T. WALL, II, DIRECTOR, RHODE ISLAND DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Petitioner v. KHALIL KHOLI
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AARON L. WEISMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JUDITH H. MIZNER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF AARON L. WEISMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:01 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
